entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
